description.value: Your draconic power equals that of a lesser dragon. Choose one 3rd-rank spell and one 4th-rank spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic benefactor's type (for example, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clairvoyance] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Paralyze] for a conspirator dragon benefactor). You can cast each of these spells once per day as innate spells of the same tradition as your draconic benefactor.
